SELECT B.ROLE_ID, B.ROLE_CODE, TL.ROLE_NAME, TL.ROLE_DESCRIPTION FROM SYS_ROLE_B B LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_ROLE_TL TL ON TL.ROLE_ID = B.ROLE_ID AND TL.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=java.lang.String} WHERE B.ROLE_ID NOT IN ( SELECT ROLE_ID FROM SYS_USER_ROLE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL,javaType=java.lang.Long} ) AND ( B.START_ACTIVE_DATE IS NULL OR CURRENT_TIMESTAMP > B.START_ACTIVE_DATE ) AND ( B.END_ACTIVE_DATE IS NULL OR B.END_ACTIVE_DATE > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ) AND B.ENABLE_FLAG='Y'
AND B.ROLE_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{roleCode},'%'))
AND TL.ROLE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{roleName},'%'))
ORDER BY B.ROLE_CODE ASC

SELECT R.ROLE_ID, R.ROLE_CODE, R.ROLE_NAME, R.ROLE_DESCRIPTION, R.ENABLE_FLAG, R.END_ACTIVE_DATE FROM SYS_USER_ROLE UR LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_ROLE_B R ON UR.ROLE_ID = R.ROLE_ID WHERE UR.USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL,javaType=java.lang.Long} AND R.ENABLE_FLAG = 'Y'

SELECT UR.SUR_ID, UR.USER_ID, R.ROLE_ID, R.ROLE_CODE, R.ROLE_NAME, R.ROLE_DESCRIPTION, R.ENABLE_FLAG, R.END_ACTIVE_DATE, R.START_ACTIVE_DATE FROM SYS_USER_ROLE UR, SYS_ROLE_B R LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_ROLE_TL TL ON ( R.ROLE_ID = TL.ROLE_ID AND TL.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=java.lang.String} ) WHERE UR.USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL,javaType=java.lang.Long} AND UR.ROLE_ID = R.ROLE_ID ORDER BY R.ROLE_CODE ASC

SELECT UR.SUR_ID , UR.USER_ID , R.ROLE_ID, R.ROLE_CODE, R.ROLE_NAME FROM SYS_USER_ROLE UR LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_ROLE_B R ON UR.ROLE_ID = R.ROLE_ID WHERE UR.USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL,javaType=java.lang.Long} AND R.ENABLE_FLAG = 'Y' AND ( R.END_ACTIVE_DATE IS NULL OR R.END_ACTIVE_DATE > current_timestamp ) AND ( R.START_ACTIVE_DATE IS NULL OR CURRENT_TIMESTAMP > R.START_ACTIVE_DATE ) ORDER BY R.ROLE_CODE ASC

SELECT SUR.ROLE_ID, SR_TL.ROLE_NAME FROM SYS_USER_ROLE SUR LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_ROLE_TL SR_TL ON ( SUR.ROLE_ID = SR_TL.ROLE_ID AND SR_TL.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) LEFT JOIN SYS_ROLE_B B ON ( B.ROLE_ID = SUR.ROLE_ID ) WHERE SUR.USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType = DECIMAL} AND ( B.END_ACTIVE_DATE IS NULL OR B.END_ACTIVE_DATE > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ) AND ( B.START_ACTIVE_DATE IS NULL OR CURRENT_TIMESTAMP > B.START_ACTIVE_DATE ) AND B.ENABLE_FLAG = 'Y'

SELECT R.ROLE_ID, R.ROLE_CODE, TL.ROLE_NAME, TL.ROLE_DESCRIPTION, R.ENABLE_FLAG FROM SYS_ROLE_B R LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_ROLE_TL TL ON ( R.ROLE_ID = TL.ROLE_ID AND TL.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=java.lang.String} ) WHERE R.ENABLE_FLAG = 'Y' AND (R.END_ACTIVE_DATE IS NULL OR R.END_ACTIVE_DATE>current_timestamp) AND (R.START_ACTIVE_DATE IS NULL OR CURRENT_TIMESTAMP>R.start_active_date )
AND R.ROLE_ID = #{roleId}
AND R.ROLE_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{roleCode},'%'))
AND TL.ROLE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{roleName},'%'))
ORDER BY R.ROLE_CODE ASC
